verses.verse: When thou goest <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> than <S%H3372>thou<s%>, thou shalt not be afraid of <S%H3068>them<s%>; for Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> is with <S%H5927>thee<s%>, who brought thee up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And it shall <S%H7126>be<s%>, when ye draw nigh unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>,

and shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Hear, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, ye draw <S%H7131>nigh<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>: let not your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H7401>faint<s%>; <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H2648>not<s%>, nor tremble, neither be ye <S%H6206>affrighted<s%> at <S%H6440>them<s%>;
for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that <S%H1980>goeth<s%> with <S%H3898>you<s%>, to fight for you against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, to save <S%H3467>you<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is there that hath <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and hath not <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> <S%H3212>it<s%>? let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> dedicate <S%H2596>it<s%>.

And what <S%H376>man<s%> is there that hath <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and hath not <S%H2490>used<s%> the fruit <S%H3212>thereof<s%>? let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> use the fruit <S%H2490>thereof<s%>.

And what <S%H376>man<s%> is there that hath <S%H781>betrothed<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and hath not <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3212>her<s%>? let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> take <S%H3947>her<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is there that is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H7390>faint-hearted<s%>? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest his <S%H251>brethren<s%>'s <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melt<s%> as his <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And it shall <S%H7860>be<s%>, when the officers have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
When thou drawest <S%H7126>nigh<s%> unto a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7121>it<s%>, then proclaim peace unto <S%H7965>it<s%>.

And it shall <S%H6030>be<s%>, if it make thee answer of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H6605>open<s%> unto <S%H5971>thee<s%>, then it shall be, that all the people that are <S%H4672>found<s%> therein shall become <S%H4522>tributary<s%> unto <S%H5647>thee<s%>, and shall serve thee.
And if it will make no <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H6213>thee<s%>, but will make <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H6696>thee<s%>, then thou shalt besiege it:

and when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivereth<s%> it into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> every <S%H2138>male<s%> thereof with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>:

but the <S%H802>women<s%>, and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and all that is in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H962>thereof<s%>, shalt thou take for a prey unto <S%H398>thyself<s%>; and thou shalt eat the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

Thus shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H3966>very<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> from <S%H2007>thee<s%>, which are not of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

But of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, thou shalt save <S%H2421>alive<s%> nothing that <S%H5397>breatheth<s%>;

but thou shalt <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H2850>them<s%>: the Hittite, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath commanded <S%H6680>thee<s%>;

that they <S%H3925>teach<s%> you not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>; so would ye <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

When thou shalt <S%H6696>besiege<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>, in making <S%H3898>war<s%> against it to <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H7843>it<s%>, thou shalt not destroy the <S%H6086>trees<s%> thereof by <S%H5080>wielding<s%> an <S%H1631>axe<s%> against <S%H398>them<s%>; for thou mayest eat of <S%H3772>them<s%>, and thou shalt not cut them down; for is the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>, that it <S%H935>should<s%> be besieged of <S%H6440>thee<s%>?

Only the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> that they are not <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and cut them <S%H3772>down<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4692>bulwarks<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H3381>thee<s%>, until it fall.
